Regularly $70, you’re looking at a nearly 15% price drop and a new Amazon all-time low. This is the Tactical Edition that includes the base game on the disc as well as a voucher for the regularly $15 Sneaking DLC Pack with 10 cosmetic items and the White Tuxedo. If you’re yet to pick up this frankly quite impressive remake of the MGS classic, you can now do so on Amazon with a nice little price drop – the first notable discount we have tracked there to date.

This weekly roundup collects all of the coolest new gadgets, the most interesting updates in the world of tech, and more from the past week, and organizes it into a single handy reading list for you to sift through every Sunday morning. This week we have some early looks at the first 2025 Black Friday ads, Best Buy’s holiday deal schedule, new LEGO Goonies, new Kirby Air Riders gameplay, and much more.

items.title: Electrified Weekly – early access Black Friday deals on new Aventon e-bikes, Exclusive EcoFlow station lows, more
items.summary:
Welcome to 9to5Toys Electrified Weekly – the best place to find all of this week’s best deals and new releases to electrify your life and protect Mother Nature. We’ve got another solid week of Green Deals for you here, with our EV coverage being led by the Early Access to Black Friday Aventon Sale that is seeing up to $400 discounts on legacy – but more importantly – new smart e-bikes, like the Pace 4 commuter at a new $1,599 low, the Aventure 3 all-terrain e-bike at $1,799, and the Level 3 commmuter at $1,699 – the latter two being first-ever discounts!

We also have Halloween Sales running through the rest of the month from EcoFlow, Anker SOLIX, and Jackery – with some notable exclusive deals like the EcoFlow DELTA Pro power station at a new $1,299 low, as well as the bundle of the DELTA 2 Max station with a FREE Solar Hat at a new $799 low.
